overview:
Gaylord Zach is CTO at TVmoment a new social TV venture with the unique technology to sync people’s internet experience to the TV show they are currently watching.

In 2005 he was part of the launch team of Ostrich Media in London building an interactive quiz TV channel in the UK. Initially setting up all the technology required for live interactivity and television broadcasts in the UK and internationally, he continued until early 2010 to manage the entire business after its sale to Buongiorno .

Back In 2000 he founded LOGandGO an account aggregation service that for the first time allowed customers to check their bank account statements securely from their mobile phones.

Gaylord made his degree in computer science and micro electronics at the Technical University in Berlin. He specializes in providing solutions for technically challenging opportunities with both technical expertise and entrepreneurial spirit.
